original_text: The Egyptians will become afraid, so that they do not know what to do. They will ask for help from their idols. They will ask the spirits of dead people to tell them what to do. They will ask magicians to talk to those spirits on their behalf.
korean_text: 애굽인의 정신이 그 속에서 쇠약할 것이요 그의 계획을 내가 깨뜨리리니 그들이 우상과 마술사와 신접한 자와 요술객에게 물으리로다

sentences.original_text: so that they do not know what to do
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 무엇을 해야 할지 알지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will ask for help from their idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신들의 우상에게 도움을 구할 것이다

sentences.original_text: They will ask the spirits of dead people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 죽은 사람들의 영들에게 물을 것이다

sentences.original_text: to tell them what to do
They will ask magicians to talk to those spirits
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 마술사들에게 그 영들과 대화하도록 요청할 것이다
